attributes.action: Allow the voting of NO as well as YES on these petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will avoid duplicate petitions - ie. you can just vote no instead of having to create an opposite petition

rejection.details: Many thanks for this feedback. We will consider this very seriously while we review how this beta testing phase has worked. Your thoughts are very welcome.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
